conclusion: Need to analyze the v-t graph to determine acceleration from 1 to 3 seconds.
Identify the interval from t = 1 second to t = 3 seconds.
At t = 1 second, the velocity v1 = 2 m/s.
At t = 3 seconds, the velocity v2 = -2 m/s.
Calculate the change in velocity: Δv = v2 - v1 = -4 m/s.
Calculate the time interval: Δt = 3 s - 1 s = 2 s.
Calculate the acceleration: a = Δv/Δt = -2 m/s².
The acceleration of the particle during the time interval from 1 to 3 seconds is -2 m/s².
